location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Gideon Colquhoun, in Charge at Bussora [Basra], to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Gideon Colquhoun, in Charge at Bussora [Basra], to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, discussing Shaik Rehma ben Jauber [Rahma bin Jabir], who captured a buggalah [buggalow] belonging to Shaik Ben Risk, requesting Bruce to join him in his effort to obtain the restitution of the boat, as a sign of gratitude for Shaik Ben Risk, who helped the British Government in previous occasions.
